About this report

Report parameters

Contexts

No contexts were selected, so all contexts were included by default.

Sites

The following sites were included:

  • https://www.apple.com

(If no sites were selected, all sites were included by default.)

An included site must also be within one of the included contexts for its data to be included in the report.

Risk levels

Included: High, Medium, Low, Informational

Excluded: None

Confidence levels

Included: User Confirmed, High, Medium, Low

Excluded: User Confirmed, High, Medium, Low, False Positive

Alerts

  1. Risk=Medium, Confidence=High (5)

    1. https://www.apple.com (5)

      1. CSP: Wildcard Directive (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/cn/*/aow/
          Alert tags
          • CWE-693
          • OWASP_2021_A05
          • OWASP_2017_A06
          Alert description

          Content Security Policy (CSP) is an added layer of security that helps to detect and mitigate certain types of attacks. Including (but not limited to) Cross Site Scripting (XSS), and data injection attacks. These attacks are used for everything from data theft to site defacement or distribution of malware. CSP provides a set of standard HTTP headers that allow website owners to declare approved sources of content that browsers should be allowed to load on that page — covered types are JavaScript, CSS, HTML frames, fonts, images and embeddable objects such as Java applets, ActiveX, audio and video files.
          Other info

          The following directives either allow wildcard sources (or ancestors), are not defined, or are overly broadly defined:

          frame-ancestors, form-action

          The directive(s): frame-ancestors, form-action are among the directives that do not fallback to default-src, missing/excluding them is the same as allowing anything.
          Request
          Request line and header section (253 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/cn/*/aow/ HTTP/1.1
host: www.apple.com
user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:125.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/125.0
pragma: no-cache
cache-control: no-cache
referer: https://www.apple.com/robots.txt
Cookie: geo=IN
          Request body (0 bytes)
          Response
          Status line and header section (1373 bytes) 
          HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently
Server: Apple
Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Length: 239
Location: https://www.apple.com.cn/*/aow/
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubdomains; preload
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Referrer-Policy: no-referrer-when-downgrade
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' blob: data: *.akamaized.net *.apple.com *.apple-mapkit.com *.cdn-apple.com *.organicfruitapps.com; child-src blob: mailto: embed.music.apple.com embed.podcasts.apple.com https://recyclingprogram.apple.com swdlp.apple.com www.apple.com www.instagram.com platform.twitter.com www.youtube-nocookie.com; img-src 'unsafe-inline' blob: data: *.apple.com *.apple-mapkit.com *.cdn-apple.com *.mzstatic.com; script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' blob: *.apple.com *.apple-mapkit.com www.instagram.com platform.twitter.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline' *.apple.com
Cache-Control: max-age=556
Expires: Thu, 19 Dec 2024 11:00:15 GMT
Date: Thu, 19 Dec 2024 10:50:59 GMT

Connection: keep-alive
X-Cache-Remote: TCP_REFRESH_MISS from a104-86-188-236.deploy.akamaitechnologies.com (AkamaiGHost/11.7.2.1-35a4fcef889a1f053c9fa641f2ccd99a) (S)

          <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//IETF//DTD HTML 2.0//EN">
<html><head>
<title>301 Moved Permanently</title>
</head><body>
<h1>Moved Permanently</h1>
<p>The document has moved <a href="https://www.apple.com.cn/*/aow/">here</a>.</p>
</body></html>
          Parameter 
          Content-Security-Policy
          Evidence 
          default-src 'self' blob: data: *.akamaized.net *.apple.com *.apple-mapkit.com *.cdn-apple.com *.organicfruitapps.com; child-src blob: mailto: embed.music.apple.com embed.podcasts.apple.com https://recyclingprogram.apple.com swdlp.apple.com www.apple.com www.instagram.com platform.twitter.com www.youtube-nocookie.com; img-src 'unsafe-inline' blob: data: *.apple.com *.apple-mapkit.com *.cdn-apple.com *.mzstatic.com; script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' blob: *.apple.com *.apple-mapkit.com www.instagram.com platform.twitter.com; style-src 'unsafe-inline' *.apple.com
          Solution

          Ensure that your web server, application server, load balancer, etc. is properly configured to set the Content-Security-Policy header.
      2. CSP: script-src unsafe-eval (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/cn/*/aow/
          Alert tags
          • CWE-693
          • OWASP_2021_A05
          • OWASP_2017_A06
          Alert description

          Content Security Policy (CSP) is an added layer of security that helps to detect and mitigate certain types of attacks. Including (but not limited to) Cross Site Scripting (XSS), and data injection attacks. These attacks are used for everything from data theft to site defacement or distribution of malware. CSP provides a set of standard HTTP headers that allow website owners to declare approved sources of content that browsers should be allowed to load on that page — covered types are JavaScript, CSS, HTML frames, fonts, images and embeddable objects such as Java applets, ActiveX, audio and video files.

      5. Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/leadership/
          Alert tags
          • CWE-693
          • OWASP_2021_A05
          • OWASP_2017_A06
          Alert description

          Content Security Policy (CSP) is an added layer of security that helps to detect and mitigate certain types of attacks, including Cross Site Scripting (XSS) and data injection attacks. These attacks are used for everything from data theft to site defacement or distribution of malware. CSP provides a set of standard HTTP headers that allow website owners to declare approved sources of content that browsers should be allowed to load on that page — covered types are JavaScript, CSS, HTML frames, fonts, images and embeddable objects such as Java applets, ActiveX, audio and video files.

                    </a>
                </li>

<script type="text/javascript" src="/ac/localeswitcher/4/en_US/scripts/localeswitcher.built.js"></script>

    </div>
</footer>
<script src="/leadership/scripts/main.built.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
</body>
</html>
          Solution

          Ensure that your web server, application server, load balancer, etc. is configured to set the Content-Security-Policy header.

  2. Risk=Medium, Confidence=Medium (1)

    1. https://www.apple.com (1)

      1. Cross-Domain Misconfiguration (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/105/media/us/airpods-pro/2024/b27a681d-da0c-42e3-8e0e-f37d5243ca69/films/heartstrings/airpods-pro-heartstrings-tpl-us-2024_16x9.m3u8
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2017_A05
          • CWE-264
          • OWASP_2021_A01
          Alert description

          Web browser data loading may be possible, due to a Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) misconfiguration on the web server.
          Other info

          The CORS misconfiguration on the web server permits cross-domain read requests from arbitrary third party domains, using unauthenticated APIs on this domain. Web browser implementations do not permit arbitrary third parties to read the response from authenticated APIs, however. This reduces the risk somewhat. This misconfiguration could be used by an attacker to access data that is available in an unauthenticated manner, but which uses some other form of security, such as IP address white-listing.
          Request
          Request line and header section (618 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/105/media/us/airpods-pro/2024/b27a681d-da0c-42e3-8e0e-f37d5243ca69/films/heartstrings/airpods-pro-heartstrings-tpl-us-2024_16x9.m3u8 HTTP/1.1
host: www.apple.com
user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:125.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/125.0
pragma: no-cache
cache-control: no-cache
referer: https://www.apple.com/

          Evidence 
          Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
          Solution

          Ensure that sensitive data is not available in an unauthenticated manner (using IP address white-listing, for instance).

          Configure the "Access-Control-Allow-Origin" HTTP header to a more restrictive set of domains, or remove all CORS headers entirely, to allow the web browser to enforce the Same Origin Policy (SOP) in a more restrictive manner.

  3. Risk=Low, Confidence=Medium (4)

    1. https://www.apple.com (4)

      1. Cookie No HttpOnly Flag (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/robots.txt
          Alert tags
          • CWE-1004
          • OWASP_2021_A05
          • OWASP_2017_A06
          • WSTG-v42-SESS-02
          Alert description

          A cookie has been set without the HttpOnly flag, which means that the cookie can be accessed by JavaScript. If a malicious script can be run on this page then the cookie will be accessible and can be transmitted to another site. If this is a session cookie then session hijacking may be possible.

      3. Cookie without SameSite Attribute (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/robots.txt
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2021_A01
          • OWASP_2017_A05
          • WSTG-v42-SESS-02
          • CWE-1275
          Alert description

          A cookie has been set without the SameSite attribute, which means that the cookie can be sent as a result of a 'cross-site' request. The SameSite attribute is an effective counter measure to cross-site request forgery, cross-site script inclusion, and timing attacks.

      4. Cross-Domain JavaScript Source File Inclusion (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/us/search
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2021_A08
          • CWE-829
          Alert description

          The page includes one or more script files from a third-party domain.

          Request line and header section (495 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/us/search HTTP/1.1

            <script crossorigin="anonymous">
                     if (/(iPad).*OS ([6-9]|[1-9][0-9]).*AppleWebKit.*Mobile.*Safari/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                       var headNode = document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
var sbNode = document.createElement('meta');
var url = decodeURI("https://www.apple.com/search");
var ses = "; " + document.cookie;
var sesParts = ses.split("; s_vi=");
ses = sesParts.length == 2 ? sesParts.pop().split(";").shift() : '';
if (ses !== '') {
    url += url.indexOf('?') >= 0 ? '&' : '?';
    url += 'ses=' + encodeURI(ses);
}
sbNode.name = 'apple-itunes-app';
sbNode.content = 'app-id=375380948, app-argument=' + url;
headNode.appendChild(sbNode);

                     }
                    else if (/(iPhone|iPod).*OS ([6-9]|[1-9][0-9]).*AppleWebKit.*Mobile.*Safari/.test(navigator.userAgent)) {
                      var headNode = document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
var sbNode = document.createElement('meta');
var url = decodeURI("https://www.apple.com/search");
var ses = "; " + document.cookie;
var sesParts = ses.split("; s_vi=");
ses = sesParts.length == 2 ? sesParts.pop().split(";").shift() : '';
if (ses !== '') {
    url += url.indexOf('?') >= 0 ? '&' : '?';
    url += 'ses=' + encodeURI(ses);
}
sbNode.name = 'apple-itunes-app';
sbNode.content = 'app-id=375380948, app-argument=' + url;
headNode.appendChild(sbNode);

                    }
            </script>

    <script crossorigin="anonymous">
        window.ECHO_CONFIG = {
            metadata: {
                environment: "",
                format: "common",
                fmt: "common",
                region: "amr",
                country: "US",
                sf: "us",
                segment: "Consumer",
                locale: "en-us",
                referer: document.referrer,
                node: "standard/home/search/search_results",
                pageResource: "accessories-3",
                feature: "search-results",
                targetEnabled: "false"
            },
            config: {
                "pageViewId": Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 12) + '-' + Date.now().toString(36),
                "app": "com.apple.www.Store",
                "delaySendingPageViewDataMS": 500,
                "nonEssentialEventSampleRatePct": 0.1,
                "altTextEventSampleRatePct": 0.1,
                "customEventSampleRatePct": 1.0,
                "interactionEventSampleRatePct": 100.0,
                "performanceMeasureEventSampleRatePct": 1.0,
                "performanceNowEventSampleRatePct": 10.0,
                "resourceEventSampleRatePct": 0.1,
                "performanceMeasurePollingIntervalMS": 1000,
                "performanceMeasuresToReport": "".split(','),
                "resourceDisallowedResourceList": "securemetrics.apple.com".split(','),
                "resourcePollingIntervalMS": 2001,
                "sendErrors": true,
                "sendPageViewData": true,
                "sendResourceData":  true,
                "url": "https://xp.apple.com/report/2/xp_aos_clientperf,/shop/mdp/api/echo",
                "passiveEventIngestionUrl": "https://xp.apple.com/report/2/xp_aos_clientperf",
                "criticalEventIngestionUrl": "/shop/mdp/api/echo",
                "sendLoggingData": true
            }
        };

        window.AS_LOG_LEVEL = "ERROR";
    </script>

    <script crossorigin="anonymous">
        document.addEventListener('readystatechange', function() {
            function createAndDispatchEchoEvent(data) {
                var event = new CustomEvent("echoPerformanceNowEvent", {
                    detail: data,
                });
                window.dispatchEvent(event);
            }

            if (document.readyState === "interactive") {
                let lastIntersectedTime = 0;

                const observerCallback = function (entries, observer) {
                    entries.forEach((entry) => {
                        if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                            lastIntersectedTime = performance.now();
                        }

                        observer.unobserve(entry.target);
                    });

                    observer.disconnect();

                    // Dispatch time for last intersecting object with viewport
                    createAndDispatchEchoEvent({
                        id: "viewportLoad",
                        performanceNow: lastIntersectedTime,
                    });
                };
            
                if (window.IntersectionObserver) {
                    // get all the els on page
                    const itemsInViewport = document.querySelectorAll('*');

                    // instantiate 
                    const intersectionObserver = new IntersectionObserver(observerCallback, {
                        root: null,
                        rootMargin: "0px 0px 0px 0px",
                        threshold: 0.0,
                    });

                    // iterate over all els and observe each one
                    itemsInViewport.forEach(el => {
                        intersectionObserver.observe(el);
                    });
                } //END window.IntersectionObserver
            } //END document.readyState === "interactive"
        });
    </script>

            src="https://store.storeimages.cdn-apple.com/4982/store.apple.com/static-resources/rs-external-1.61.0-5cadd/rel/unsupportedBrowser.min.js"

        <script data-srs src="https://store.storeimages.cdn-apple.com/4982/store.apple.com/static-resources/rs-globalelements-2.13.1-45174/dist/ac-globalnav.umd.js" defer crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script data-srs src="https://store.storeimages.cdn-apple.com/4982/store.apple.com/static-resources/rs-globalelements-2.13.1-45174/dist/globalelements.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>





    


    <script crossorigin="anonymous">
        (function () {
            const logger = typeof window.Log === "function" ? window.Log("pixel") : window.console;

            try {
                function sanitizeAndNormalizePathname(pathname) {
                    let newPathname = pathname;
                    let decodedPathname;

                    try {
                        decodedPathname = decodeURIComponent(pathname);
                    } catch (error) {
                        decodedPathname = pathname;
                    }

                    // first handle /storepickup and /<sf>/storepickup
                    if (decodedPathname.includes('/storepickup')) {
                        newPathname = '/storepickup';
                    }

                    // then handle /store and /<sf>/store
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/store')) {
                        const base = '/store';
                        const path = decodedPathname.split('/store')[1];
                        newPathname = `${base}${path}`;
                    }

                    // handle /search and /<sf>/search
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/search')) {
                        newPathname = '/search';
                    }

                    // handle /giftcard and /<sf>/giftcard
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/giftcard')) {
                        newPathname = '/giftcard';
                    }

                    // handle /shop/bag/saved_bag and /<sf>/shop/bag/saved_bag
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/bag/saved_bag')) {
                        const base = '/shop/bag/saved_bag';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/order and /<sf>/shop/order
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/bag')) {
                        const base = '/shop/bag';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/order and /<sf>/shop/order
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/pdpAddToBag')) {
                        const base = '/shop/pdpAddToBag';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/order and /<sf>/shop/order
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/order')) {
                        const base = '/shop/order';
                        const path = decodedPathname
                            .split(base)[1]
                            .replace(/\d/g, '0')
                            .replace(/[\w.-]+@[\w.-]+\.\w+/g, 'user@example.com');
                        newPathname = `${base}${path}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/recap and /<sf>/shop/recap
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/recap')) {
                        const base = '/shop/recap';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/start and /<sf>/shop/start
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/start')) {
                        const base = '/shop/start';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/confirm and /<sf>/shop/confirm
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/confirm')) {
                        const base = '/shop/confirm';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/posThankYou and /<sf>/shop/posThankYou
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/posThankYou')) {
                        const base = '/shop/posThankYou';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop/yoursaves and /<sf>/shop/yoursaves
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop/yoursaves')) {
                        const base = '/shop/yoursaves';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    // handle /shop and /<sf>/shop
                    else if (decodedPathname.includes('/shop')) {
                        const base = '/shop';
                        const path = decodedPathname.split('/shop')[1];
                        newPathname = `${base}${path}`;
                    }

                    // handle %
                    if (newPathname.includes('%')) {
                        newPathname = newPathname.split('%')[0];
                    }

                    return newPathname;
                }

                function getSanitizedLocation(location) {
                    if (!location) {
                        return {};
                    }
                    const newLocation = new URL(location);
                    if (newLocation.protocol.startsWith('http')) {
                        return newLocation;
                    }
                    newLocation.pathname = 'pathname';
                    return newLocation;
                }

                function getAosSanitizedLocation(location) {
                    const sanitizedLocation = getSanitizedLocation(location);

                    const normalizedPath = sanitizeAndNormalizePathname(sanitizedLocation.pathname);

                    sanitizedLocation.hash = '';
                    sanitizedLocation.href = `${sanitizedLocation.protocol}//${sanitizedLocation.host}${normalizedPath}`;
                    sanitizedLocation.password = '';
                    sanitizedLocation.pathname = normalizedPath;
                    sanitizedLocation.search = '';

                    return sanitizedLocation;
                }

                const sanitizedLocation = getAosSanitizedLocation(window.location);

                function getPageShopPath(pathname) {
                    let newPathname = pathname;

                    // handle /shop/product and /<sf>/shop/product
                    if (newPathname.includes('/shop/product')) {
                        const base = '/shop/product';
                        newPathname = `${base}`;
                    }

                    const pathElements = newPathname.split('/');

                    if (pathElements.length <= 5) {
                        return newPathname;
                    }

                    return pathElements.slice(0, 4).join('/');
                }

                const pageViewId = window.ECHO_CONFIG && window.ECHO_CONFIG.config && window.ECHO_CONFIG.config.pageViewId;
                const referrer = document.referrer.includes('apple.com') ? getAosSanitizedLocation(document.referrer).href : document.referrer;
                const host = sanitizedLocation.host;
                const pageHostname = sanitizedLocation.hostname;
                const pagePathname = sanitizedLocation.pathname;
                const pageUrl = sanitizedLocation.href;
                const pageShopPath = getPageShopPath(sanitizedLocation.pathname);
                const src = `/shop/mdp/echo/pixel.gif?pageViewId=${pageViewId}&referrer=${referrer}&referer=${referrer}&host=${host}&pageHostname=${pageHostname}&pageUrl=${pageUrl}&pagePathname=${pagePathname}&pageShopPath=${pageShopPath}&eventType=pageview&environment=&format=common&region=amr&country=US&sf=us&segment=Consumer&locale=en-us&node=standard/home/search/search_results&pageResource=accessories-3&feature=search-results`;
                const pixelScript = document.createElement("img");

                pixelScript.setAttribute("src", src);
            } catch (e) {
                logger.error(e);
            }
        })();
    </script>

    <noscript>
        <img src="/shop/mdp/echo/pixel.gif?pageViewId=no-js&referrer=no-js&referer=no-js&host=no-js&pageHostname=no-js&pageUrl=no-js&pagePathname=no-js&pageShopPath=no-js&eventType=pageview&environment=&format=common&region=amr&country=US&sf=Consumer&segment=Consumer&locale=en-us&node=standard/home/search/search_results&pageResource=accessories-3&feature=search-results" width="1" height="1" />
    </noscript>

<script crossorigin="anonymous">
	if(!/dssid2/.test(document.cookie) || !/as_dc/.test(document.cookie)) {
		document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
			const ie = document.createElement("IMG");
			ie.src = '/shop/dc';
			ie.width = 1;
			ie.height = 1;
			ie.style.display = "none";
			ie.alt = "";
			document.body.appendChild(ie);
		});
	}
</script>

		    <div class="metrics">

    </noscript>

    <script crossorigin="anonymous">
            if (window.asMetrics && window.asMetrics.initialize) {
                window.asMetrics.initialize();
            }
    </script>


    </div>

	if(!/dssid2/.test(document.cookie) || !/as_dc/.test(document.cookie)) {
		document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
			const ie = document.createElement("IMG");
			ie.src = '/shop/dc';
			ie.width = 1;
			ie.height = 1;
			ie.style.display = "none";
			ie.alt = "";
			document.body.appendChild(ie);
		});

</script>

    <script id="aos-gn-links" type="application/json">
    {  "educationrouting" : "https://www.apple.com/shop/browse/home/education_routing",  "special_deals" : "https://www.apple.com/shop/refurbished",  "buy_iphone/iphone_se" : "ipad/accessories" : "https://www.apple.com/shop/ipad/accessories",  "accessories/all_accessories/made_by_apple" : "https://www.apple.com/shop/accessories/all/made-by-apple",  "watch/bands" :             <div class="as-globalfooter-mini" data-nosnippet data-autom="global-footer-mini" typeof="Organization">
    <div class="as-globalfooter-mini-shop"  x-ms-format-detection="none">
                <p>More ways to shop: <span class="nowrap"><a href="https://www.apple.com/retail" data-slot-name="footerConfig" data-feature-name="Footer Navigation" data-display-name="Find an Apple Store">Find an Apple Store</a></span> or <a href="https://locate.apple.com" data-slot-name="footerConfig" data-feature-name="Footer Navigation" data-display-name="other retailer" data-autom="other_retailer">other retailer</a> near you. Or <span class="nowrap">call <span>1‑800‑MY‑APPLE</span></span>.</p>
    </div>
    <div class="as-globalfooter-mini-locale">
<a href="https://www.apple.com/choose-your-country"   data-slot-name="footerConfig" data-feature-name="Footer Navigation" data-display-name="Country Selector"    
  class="as-globalfooter-mini-locale-link" data-autom="footer">                            United States
</a>    </div>
    <div class="as-globalfooter-mini-legal">
                <div class="as-globalfooter-mini-legal-copyright">
                    Copyright &copy; 2024 Apple Inc.  All rights reserved.
                </div>
        <ul class="as-globalfooter-mini-legal-links">

</section>

        </div>
    </footer>

		<div id="portal"></div>
	</body>
</html>
          Parameter 
          https://store.storeimages.cdn-apple.com/4982/store.apple.com/static-resources/rs-external-1.61.0-5cadd/rel/unsupportedBrowser.min.js
          Evidence 
          <script data-srs

            src="https://store.storeimages.cdn-apple.com/4982/store.apple.com/static-resources/rs-external-1.61.0-5cadd/rel/unsupportedBrowser.min.js"


         nomodule crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
          Solution

          Ensure JavaScript source files are loaded from only trusted sources, and the sources can't be controlled by end users of the application.

  4. Risk=Low, Confidence=Low (1)

    1. https://www.apple.com (1)

      1. Timestamp Disclosure - Unix (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2021_A01
          • OWASP_2017_A03
          • CWE-200
          Alert description

          A timestamp was disclosed by the application/web server. - Unix
          Other info

          1601557395, which evaluates to: 2020-10-01 18:33:15.
          Request
          Request line and header section (185 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/ HTTP/1.1
host: www.apple.com
user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:125.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/125.0

cache-control: no-cache
          Request body (0 bytes)
          Response

          HTTP/1.1 200 OK

        <script>
(function() {
	var rootPath = '/us';

	if (rootPath === '(none)' || rootPath === '/us') {
		rootPath = '';
	}

	var endPoint = rootPath + '/shop/experience-meta';

	if (!window.acTargetCustomSettings) {
		window.acTargetCustomSettings = {
			constants : {
				asTexServiceEndpoint: endPoint
			}
		}
	} else {
		if (!window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants) {
			window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants = {};
		}
		window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants.asTexServiceEndpoint = window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants.asTexServiceEndpoint || endPoint;
	}
})();
</script>

	<h1 class="visuallyhidden">Apple</h1>

				globalnav-item

0-.3149-.062-.4326-.1846-.2295-.2388-.2222-.6187.0171-.8481l6.5537-6.2959z\"/></svg>"}]}},"hasAbsoluteUrls":false,"hasShopRedirectUrls":false,"analyticsType":"marcom","storeApiKey":"","wwwDomain":"www.apple.com","textDirection":"ltr","searchUrlPath":"/us/search","storeRootPath":"/us","storeUrlPath":"/us","submenuApiUrl":"/api-www/global-elements/global-header/v1/flyouts"},"config":{"version":"ac-globalheader-192-20240507-154002"}}}</script>

					<div class="fam-gallery-overlay">
						<span class="fam-gallery-button button button-primary-light">Watch now</span>
					</div>
				</div>

				<div class="fam-gallery-copy">
					<p class="fam-gallery-title">Strength with Gregg</p>
				</div></a></div>
	</div>
</div>

							<button class="fam-gallery-play-pause"></button>
						</div>
				</div>
			</section>
			
	</main>

	<footer
		 class="no-js" 
		lang="en-US"
		id="ac-globalfooter"
		data-nosnippet
		data-analytics-region="global footer"
		role="contentinfo"
		aria-labelledby="ac-gf-label"
	>
		<div class="ac-gf-content">
			<h2 class="ac-gf-label" id="ac-gf-label">Apple Footer</h2>

				<section class="ac-gf-sosumi" aria-label="Footnotes">

					<ul>
						<li><span id='footnote-1'>1.</span> Hearing Aid and Hearing Test: The Hearing Aid feature has received FDA authorization. The Hearing Test and Hearing Aid features are supported on AirPods Pro 2 with the latest firmware paired with a compatible iPhone or iPad with iOS 18 or iPadOS 18 and later and are intended for people 18 years old or older. The Hearing Aid feature is also supported on a compatible Mac with macOS Sequoia and later. It is intended for people with perceived mild to moderate hearing loss.
<br><br>
Hearing Protection: The Hearing Protection feature works with AirPods Pro 2 with the latest firmware when paired with a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac with iOS 18, iPadOS 18, or macOS Sequoia and later. Feature is only available in the U.S. and Canada. See <a href="https://support.apple.com/120850" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">support.apple.com/120850</a> for total attenuation and more information. The Hearing Protection feature is not suitable for protection against extremely loud impulse sounds, such as gunfire, fireworks, or jackhammers, or against sustained sounds louder than 110 dBA.
</li>
						<li><span id='footnote-2' class='tax-holiday-legal-hide'>2. Trade‑in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade‑in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple Gift Card. Trade‑in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple Gift Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In‑store trade‑in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in‑store and online trade‑in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade‑in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade‑in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apple’s trade-in partner for trade‑in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply.</span>
</li>
						<li>To access and use all Apple Card features and products available only to Apple Card users, you must add Apple Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch. </li>
						<li>If you reside in the U.S. territories, please call Goldman Sachs at 877-255-5923 with questions about Apple Card.</li>
						<li>Learn more about how Apple Card applications are evaluated at <a href="https://support.apple.com/kb/HT209218">support.apple.com/kb/HT209218</a>.</li>
						<li><span class="tv-plus-legal">Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of MLB Advanced Media, L.P. All rights reserved.</span></li>
						<li> Apple Intelligence is available in beta on all iPhone 16 models, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPad mini (A17 Pro), and iPad and Mac models with M1 and later, with Siri and device language set to English (Australia, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, UK, or U.S.), as part of an iOS 18, iPadOS 18, and macOS Sequoia software update. Additional features and languages will be available in April, with more languages coming over the course of the year. Languages supported in 2025 include Chinese, English (India, Singapore), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Spanish, and Vietnamese.
</li>
						<li><span class="fam-legal">A subscription is required for Apple Arcade, Apple Fitness+, Apple Music, and Apple TV+.</span>
</li>
						<li>Features are subject to change. Some features, applications, and services may not be available in all regions or all languages.
</li>
					</ul>
				</section>

				<ul id="footer-directory-column-section-healthcare" class="ac-gf-directory-column-section-list" role="list">
					<li class="ac-gf-directory-column-section-item" role="listitem"><a class="ac-gf-directory-column-section-link" href="/healthcare/" data-analytics-title="apple in healthcare">Apple in Healthcare</a></li>

				</ul>
			</div>

          Evidence 
          1601557395
          Solution

          Manually confirm that the timestamp data is not sensitive, and that the data cannot be aggregated to disclose exploitable patterns.

  5. Risk=Informational, Confidence=Medium (2)

    1. https://www.apple.com (2)

      1. Modern Web Application (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/
          Alert tags
          Alert description

          The application appears to be a modern web application. If you need to explore it automatically then the Ajax Spider may well be more effective than the standard one.
          Other info

          Links have been found with a target of '_self' - this is often used by modern frameworks to force a full page reload.
          Request
          Request line and header section (185 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/ HTTP/1.1

cache-control: no-cache
          Request body (0 bytes)

        <script>
(function() {
	var rootPath = '/us';

	if (rootPath === '(none)' || rootPath === '/us') {
		rootPath = '';
	}

	var endPoint = rootPath + '/shop/experience-meta';

	if (!window.acTargetCustomSettings) {
		window.acTargetCustomSettings = {
			constants : {
				asTexServiceEndpoint: endPoint
			}
		}
	} else {
		if (!window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants) {
			window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants = {};
		}
		window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants.asTexServiceEndpoint = window.acTargetCustomSettings.constants.asTexServiceEndpoint || endPoint;
	}
})();
</script>

	<footer
		 class="no-js" 
		lang="en-US"
		id="ac-globalfooter"
		data-nosnippet
		data-analytics-region="global footer"
		role="contentinfo"
		aria-labelledby="ac-gf-label"
	>
		<div class="ac-gf-content">
			<h2 class="ac-gf-label" id="ac-gf-label">Apple Footer</h2>

				<section class="ac-gf-sosumi" aria-label="Footnotes">

					<ul>
						<li><span id='footnote-1'>1.</span> Hearing Aid and Hearing Test: The Hearing Aid feature has received FDA authorization. The Hearing Test and Hearing Aid features are supported on AirPods Pro 2 with the latest firmware paired with a compatible iPhone or iPad with iOS 18 or iPadOS 18 and later and are intended for people 18 years old or older. The Hearing Aid feature is also supported on a compatible Mac with macOS Sequoia and later. It is intended for people with perceived mild to moderate hearing loss.
<br><br>
Hearing Protection: The Hearing Protection feature works with AirPods Pro 2 with the latest firmware when paired with a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac with iOS 18, iPadOS 18, or macOS Sequoia and later. Feature is only available in the U.S. and Canada. See <a href="https://support.apple.com/120850" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">support.apple.com/120850</a> for total attenuation and more information. The Hearing Protection feature is not suitable for protection against extremely loud impulse sounds, such as gunfire, fireworks, or jackhammers, or against sustained sounds louder than 110 dBA.
</li>
						<li><span id='footnote-2' class='tax-holiday-legal-hide'>2. Trade‑in values will vary based on the condition, year, and configuration of your eligible trade‑in device. Not all devices are eligible for credit. You must be at least the age of majority to be eligible to trade in for credit or for an Apple Gift Card. Trade‑in value may be applied toward qualifying new device purchase, or added to an Apple Gift Card. Actual value awarded is based on receipt of a qualifying device matching the description provided when estimate was made. Sales tax may be assessed on full value of a new device purchase. In‑store trade‑in requires presentation of a valid photo ID (local law may require saving this information). Offer may not be available in all stores, and may vary between in‑store and online trade‑in. Some stores may have additional requirements. Apple or its trade‑in partners reserve the right to refuse, cancel, or limit quantity of any trade‑in transaction for any reason. More details are available from Apple’s trade-in partner for trade‑in and recycling of eligible devices. Restrictions and limitations may apply.</span>
</li>
						<li>To access and use all Apple Card features and products available only to Apple Card users, you must add Apple Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch. </li>
						<li>If you reside in the U.S. territories, please call Goldman Sachs at 877-255-5923 with questions about Apple Card.</li>
						<li>Learn more about how Apple Card applications are evaluated at <a href="https://support.apple.com/kb/HT209218">support.apple.com/kb/HT209218</a>.</li>
						<li><span class="tv-plus-legal">Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights are used with permission of MLB Advanced Media, L.P. All rights reserved.</span></li>
						<li> Apple Intelligence is available in beta on all iPhone 16 models, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPad mini (A17 Pro), and iPad and Mac models with M1 and later, with Siri and device language set to English (Australia, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, UK, or U.S.), as part of an iOS 18, iPadOS 18, and macOS Sequoia software update. Additional features and languages will be available in April, with more languages coming over the course of the year. Languages supported in 2025 include Chinese, English (India, Singapore), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Spanish, and Vietnamese.
</li>
						<li><span class="fam-legal">A subscription is required for Apple Arcade, Apple Fitness+, Apple Music, and Apple TV+.</span>
</li>
						<li>Features are subject to change. Some features, applications, and services may not be available in all regions or all languages.
</li>
					</ul>
				</section>

          Evidence 
          <a
										class="unit-link"
										href="/us/shop/goto/store"
										target="_self"
										rel="follow"
										data-analytics-region="shop"
										aria-hidden="true"
										tabindex="-1">&nbsp;
									</a>
          Solution

          This is an informational alert and so no changes are required.
      2. Session Management Response Identified (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/us/shop/goto/store
          Alert tags
          Alert description

          The given response has been identified as containing a session management token. The 'Other Info' field contains a set of header tokens that can be used in the Header Based Session Management Method. If the request is in a context which has a Session Management Method set to "Auto-Detect" then this rule will change the session management to use the tokens identified.
          Other info

          cookie:dssid2

          cookie:as_pcts

  6. Risk=Informational, Confidence=Low (4)

    1. https://www.apple.com (4)

      1. Information Disclosure - Suspicious Comments (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/ac/globalnav/2.0/*/images/ac-globalnav/globalnav/search/
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2021_A01
          • WSTG-v42-INFO-05
          • OWASP_2017_A03
          • CWE-200
          Alert description

          The response appears to contain suspicious comments which may help an attacker. Note: Matches made within script blocks or files are against the entire content not only comments.
          Other info

          The following pattern was used: \bUSER\b and was detected in the element starting with: "<script type="application/ld+json">

<html class="no-js" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en-US" lang="en-US" dir="ltr" prefix="og: http://ogp.me/ns#">

<link rel="canonical" href="https://www.apple.com/errors/us_error.html" />

				</ul>
			</div>

	<script src="/v/errors/c/built/scripts/main.built.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
</body>
</html>
          Evidence 
          user
          Solution

          Remove all comments that return information that may help an attacker and fix any underlying problems they refer to.
      2. Loosely Scoped Cookie (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/robots.txt
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2021_A08
          • CWE-565
          • OWASP_2017_A06
          • WSTG-v42-SESS-02
          Alert description

          Cookies can be scoped by domain or path. This check is only concerned with domain scope.The domain scope applied to a cookie determines which domains can access it. For example, a cookie can be scoped strictly to a subdomain e.g. www.nottrusted.com, or loosely scoped to a parent domain e.g. nottrusted.com. In the latter case, any subdomain of nottrusted.com can access the cookie. Loosely scoped cookies are common in mega-applications like google.com and live.com. Cookies set from a subdomain like app.foo.bar are transmitted only to that domain by the browser. However, cookies scoped to a parent-level domain may be transmitted to the parent, or any subdomain of the parent.
          Other info

          The origin domain used for comparison was:

          www.apple.com

          geo=IN
          Request
          Request line and header section (195 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/robots.txt HTTP/1.1
host: www.apple.com
user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:125.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/125.0
pragma: no-cache
cache-control: no-cache
          Request body (0 bytes)
          Response
          Status line and header section (1404 bytes) 
          HTTP/1.1 200 OK

Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/shop/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/autopush/sitemap/sitemap-index.xml
Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/newsroom/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/retail/sitemap/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/today/sitemap-index.xml
          Solution

          Always scope cookies to a FQDN (Fully Qualified Domain Name).
      3. Re-examine Cache-control Directives (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/robots.txt
          Alert tags
          • WSTG-v42-ATHN-06
          • CWE-525
          Alert description

          The cache-control header has not been set properly or is missing, allowing the browser and proxies to cache content. For static assets like css, js, or image files this might be intended, however, the resources should be reviewed to ensure that no sensitive content will be cached.
          Request
          Request line and header section (195 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/robots.txt HTTP/1.1
host: www.apple.com
user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:125.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/125.0
pragma: no-cache
cache-control: no-cache
          Request body (0 bytes)
          Response

#DaumWebMasterTool:fe46641ef2e4f3f25544ad9d70c6029df24dd184fad54154abaa3c263cf5a09a:h7Tb+WCGBcuKBnKRAHQGEQ==

Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/shop/sitemap.xml

Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/retail/sitemap/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.apple.com/today/sitemap-index.xml
          Parameter 
          cache-control
          Evidence 
          max-age=17
          Solution

          For secure content, ensure the cache-control HTTP header is set with "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate". If an asset should be cached consider setting the directives "public, max-age, immutable".
      4. User Controllable HTML Element Attribute (Potential XSS) (1)
        1. GET https://www.apple.com/airpods-pro/?campaign=true
          Alert tags
          • OWASP_2017_A01
          • CWE-20
          • OWASP_2021_A03
          Alert description

          This check looks at user-supplied input in query string parameters and POST data to identify where certain HTML attribute values might be controlled. This provides hot-spot detection for XSS (cross-site scripting) that will require further review by a security analyst to determine exploitability.
          Other info

          User-controlled HTML attribute values were found. Try injecting special characters to see if XSS might be possible. The page at the following URL:

          https://www.apple.com/airpods-pro/?campaign=true

          appears to include user input in:

          a(n) [a] tag [data-topnav-flyout-trigger-compact] attribute

          The user input found was:

          campaign=true

          The user-controlled value was:

          true
          Request
          Request line and header section (271 bytes) 
          GET https://www.apple.com/airpods-pro/?campaign=true HTTP/1.1
host: www.apple.com
user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:125.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/125.0
pragma: no-cache
cache-control: no-cache
referer: https://www.apple.com/sitemap.xml
Cookie: geo=IN
          Request body (0 bytes)
          Response
          Status line and header section (1314 bytes) 
          HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Server: Apple

Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8

				<ul class="value-prop-list">
					<li class="value-prop" data-focus-expression>Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-4" aria-label="Footnote 2" data-modal-close>2</a></sup></li>
					<li class="value-prop" data-focus-expression>Adaptive Audio that tailors noise control to your environment.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-5" aria-label="Footnote 3" data-modal-close>3</a></sup></li>
					<li class="value-prop" data-focus-expression>Personalized Spatial Audio that immerses you in sound.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-6" aria-label="Footnote 4" data-modal-close>4</a></sup></li>
					<li class="value-prop" data-focus-expression>And a new all-in-one experience to test,<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-3" aria-label="Footnote 1" data-modal-close>1</a></sup> aid,<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-3" aria-label="Footnote 1" data-modal-close>1</a></sup> and help protect your hearing.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-7" aria-label="Footnote 5" data-modal-close>5</a></sup></li>
				</ul>
			</div>
			<div class="scroll-container-value-props">
				<div class="sticky-value-props">
					<div class="value-props-video-container">
						<picture id="overview-spatial-audio-startframe-1" class="overview-spatial-audio-startframe value-props-picture" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start":"a0t - 200vh", "end":"a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".section-value-props"]}'>
							<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />

					<picture class="overview-spatial-audio-startframe value-props-picture">

					</picture>
				</noscript>

					</div>

			</div>
		</section>
		<section class="section section-audio-performance theme-dark" data-anim-scroll-group="AudioQuality" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:audio performance">
			<div class="section-content">
				<h2 class="eyebrow-section">Audio performance</h2>
				<h3 class="headline-section">H2. More <br />immersive <br class="small" /> by<br class="medium" /><br class="large" /> every<br class="small" /> measure.</h3>
				<p class="intro-copy large-10 small-12">The Apple-designed H2 chip is the force behind the advanced audio performance of AirPods Pro 2, working with the driver and amplifier to create crisp, high-definition sound. It uses computational algorithms to deliver noise cancellation, superior three-dimensional sound, efficient battery life, and imperceivable end-to-end wireless audio latency for games — all at once.</p>
			</div>
			<div class="bento-container">
				<div class="bento">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-h2-chip">
						<div class="h2-chip-container" data-component-list="H2ChipVideo">
							<picture id="overview-h2-endframe-1" class="overview-h2-endframe h2-chip-endframe" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="The H2 chip.">
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-h2-endframe h2-chip-endframe">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_endframe__epb6gqf6qi6a_large.jpg" alt="The H2 chip.">
					</picture>
				</noscript>
							<picture id="overview-h2-startframe-1" class="overview-h2-startframe h2-chip-startframe" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"disabledWhen": ["no-enhanced", "no-heavy-media"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />

							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-h2-startframe h2-chip-startframe">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_startframe__esljbu516kgi_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_startframe__esljbu516kgi_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_startframe__esljbu516kgi_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_startframe__esljbu516kgi_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_startframe__esljbu516kgi_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/h2_startframe__esljbu516kgi_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />

					</picture>
				</noscript>
							<video class="h2-chip-video" muted playsinline preload="none" aria-hidden="true" aria-label="The brand-new H2 chip." data-inline-media-basepath="/105/media/us/airpods-pro/2022/d2deeb8e-83eb-48ea-9721-f567cf0fffa8/anim/h2/"></video>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-tall-small">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="proclaim gray-text">AirPods Pro 2 pair with Apple Vision Pro to deliver <strong>Lossless Audio with ultra-low latency</strong>, for an unprecedented sound experience.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-8" aria-label="Footnote 6" data-modal-close>6</a></sup> Both feature the <strong>H2 chip</strong>, communicating at industry-shattering speed and unlocking a revolutionary new format rendering pure, uncompressed sound in real time. So your movies, shows, and games become breathtakingly immersive.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="xray" data-component-list="Xray">
				<div class="xray-scroll-container">
					<div class="xray-sticky">
						<div class="xray-lockup-container">
							<div class="xray-lockup section-content">
								<div class="copy xray-copy guts-1">
									<p data-focus-expression>The chip uses powerful <strong>adaptation algorithms</strong> to process sound more quickly, tuning audio at the precise moment you hear it. Every detail is rendered for your specific ear shape, immersing you in <strong class='green-text'>higher&#x2011;fidelity sound.</strong></p>
								</div>
								<div class="copy xray-copy guts-2">
									<p data-focus-expression><strong>An inward-facing microphone</strong> works with voice enhancement algorithms to recognize and articulate your voice, so your phone and video calls always <span class='green-text'>sound completely natural.</span></p>
								</div>
								<picture id="overview-audio-airpod-guts-top-1" class="overview-audio-airpod-guts-top xray-airpod xray-airpod-1 xray-airpod-guts xray-airpod-1" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start":"a0t - 200vh", "end":"a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".xray-scroll-container"]}'>

								</picture>
								<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-audio-airpod-guts-top xray-airpod xray-airpod-1 xray-airpod-guts xray-airpod-1">

					</picture>
				</noscript>
							</div>
							<div class="xray-lockup section-content">
								<div class="copy xray-copy guts-3">
									<p data-focus-expression><strong>A custom-built driver and amplifier</strong> work with the H2 chip to provide lower distortion during playback, so you’ll hear <strong class='green-text'>deeper bass and crisper highs</strong> — across all volume levels.</p>
								</div>
								<picture id="overview-audio-airpod-guts-bottom-1" class="overview-audio-airpod-guts-bottom xray-airpod xray-airpod-guts xray-airpod-2" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start":"a0t - 200vh", "end":"a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".xray-scroll-container"]}'>

								</picture>

		</section>
		<section class="section section-noise-cancellation theme-dark" data-anim-scroll-group="Noise" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:intelligent noise control">
			<div class="section-content">
				<h2 class="eyebrow-section">Intelligent noise control</h2>
				<h3 class="headline-section">Unheard-of sound.<br />On every level.</h3>
				<p class="intro-copy large-11 small-12">The H2-powered AirPods Pro 2 feature Adaptive Audio, automatically prioritizing sounds that need your attention as you move through the world. By seamlessly blending pro&#x2011;level Active Noise Cancellation with Transparency mode when you need it, Adaptive Audio magically delivers the right mix of sound for any environment.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-9" aria-label="Footnote 7" data-modal-close>7</a></sup></p>
			</div>
			<div class="bento-container">
				<div class="bento bento-noise-cancellation">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-anc bento-cell-tall-small">
						<picture id="overview-noise-cancel-particle-1" class="overview-noise-cancel-particle bento-bg-picture" data-lazy>
							<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
							<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
						</picture>
						<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-noise-cancel-particle bento-bg-picture">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_particle__e2ew4rzcyjee_large.jpg" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="factoid factoid-anc">Up to<br /><span class="stat-number stat-number-anc green-text">2x</span><br /> quieter with pro&#x2011;level <br />Active Noise Cancellation.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-tall-small">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="proclaim">A driver and acoustic algorithms help <strong>pro&#x2011;level Active Noise Cancellation</strong> remove more unwanted noise. With control over what you hear — and don’t hear — you can immerse yourself in music and podcasts, or simply stay focused, like never before.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-microphones">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy large-8 medium-10 small-12" data-component-list="ANCmicrophones">
							<p class="copy">
								<strong> Noise-cancelling microphones </strong> and a rear vent are optimally placed to quickly detect sound coming in, working together to counter noise before it reaches your ear.
								<span class="pin-overflow-container">
												<span aria-hidden="true" class="pin pin-vertical pin-vertical-bottom"></span>
								</span>
							</p>
							<picture id="overview-noise-cancel-airpod-1" class="overview-noise-cancel-airpod anc-airpods-microphones-pic" data-lazy>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="Externally-faced rear vent and microphone centered on back of earbud.">
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-noise-cancel-airpod anc-airpods-microphones-pic">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/noise_cancel_airpod__bewzeymccxxu_large.jpg" alt="Externally-faced rear vent and microphone centered on back of earbud.">
					</picture>
				</noscript>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="bento-container bento-borderless">
				<div class="bento">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-full">
						<div>
							<div class="bento-cell-copy">
								<p class="copy large-6 medium-9 small-12"><strong>Four pairs of silicone tips</strong> are included to fit a wide range of ears. The tips secure AirPods Pro 2 in place and create an <span class='green-text'>acoustic seal</span> that closes in the sound.</p>
							</div>
							<div class="ear-tips-exploded">
								<div class="ear-tips-exploded-content" data-component-list="EarTips" aria-label="Extra small, small, medium, and large silicone ear tips separately organized by size next to right earbud to demonstrate easy attachment and interchangability." role="img">

			<div class="bento-container">
				<div class="bento">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-tall">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="proclaim"><strong>Transparency mode</strong> harnesses the power of H2 to minimize the intensity of loud noises like sirens or power tools — so you can comfortably hear the world around you.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-noise-monitor bento-cell-tall">
						<p class="factoid factoid-noise-monitor"><span class='green-text'>Reduces noise at </span> <span class='stat'><span class='stat-number' role='text' aria-label='48,000'>48<span class='stat-number-punctuation'>,</span>000</span>
							</span> times per second.</p>
						<div class="wave-animation bento-bg-picture" data-component-list="WaveAnimation">
							<div class="wave" data-aria-label="Green and white sound waves intertwine."></div>
							<button class="play-pause-button play-pause-button-wave" aria-hidden="true" disabled data-analytics-click-play="prop3:play | noise monitor animation" data-analytics-click-pause="prop3:pause | noise monitor animation" data-analytics-title-play="play | noise monitor animation" data-analytics-title-pause="pause | noise monitor animation" data-aria-play="play noise monitor animation" data-aria-pause="pause noise monitor animation" data-analytics-intrapage-link data-inline-media-control="PlayPause">
											<span class="slot-play icon icon-after icon-playcircle"></span>
											<span class="slot-pause icon icon-after icon-pausecircle"></span>
										</button>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="bento-container bento-borderless-top">
				<div class="bento">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-hearing-health bento-cell-full hearing-avail-2">
						<div class="large-6 small-12 copy-container">
							<div class="bento-cell-copy">
								<span class="bento-eyebrow">New</span>
								<div class="proclaim large-10 medium-12">
									<p><strong>Hearing health.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-3" aria-label="Footnote 1" data-modal-close>1</a></sup></strong> AirPods Pro 2 unlock the world’s first all-in-one hearing health experience. It provides a scientifically validated Hearing Test, a clinical-grade Hearing Aid capability, and active Hearing Protection — all available with a free software update on your iPhone or iPad.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-10" aria-label="Footnote 8" data-modal-close>8</a></sup></p>
									<p><a href="/airpods-pro/hearing-health/" data-analytics-title="learn more about hearing health" aria-label="Learn more about hearing health" class="icon-wrapper"><span class="icon-copy">Learn more</span><span class="icon icon-after more"></span></a></p>
								</div>
								<div class="hearing-avail-subcopy typography-hearing-avail-2-subcopy large-10 medium-12">
									<p>The Hearing&nbsp;Test and Hearing&nbsp;Aid features are regulated health features that require approval and will be offered after authorization is received. Feature availability varies by&nbsp;region.</p>
									<p><a href="/airpods-pro/feature-availability/" data-analytics-title="view complete list" aria-label="View a list of Hearing Health features available by region" class="icon-wrapper"><span class="icon-copy">View complete list</span><span class="icon icon-after more"></span></a></p>
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="large-offset-1 large-5 small-offset-0 small-12 image-container">
							<picture id="overview-hearing-health-iphone-1" class="overview-hearing-health-iphone hearing-health" data-lazy>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />

				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="bento-container bento-borderless-top">
				<div class="bento ">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-voice bento-cell-short-small">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<span class="bento-eyebrow"></span>
							<p class="proclaim"><strong>Voice Isolation<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-11" aria-label="Footnote 9" data-modal-close>9</a></sup></strong> improves the quality of your phone calls in loud or windy conditions. Using advanced computational audio, it reduces background noise while isolating and clarifying the sound of your voice for the person you’re speaking to.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-volume bento-cell-short-small">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="proclaim"><strong>Personalized Volume<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-11" aria-label="Footnote 9" data-modal-close>9</a></sup></strong> uses machine learning to understand your listening preferences in different environments, and automatically adapts sound based on your patterns over time.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-conversation bento-cell-short-small">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="proclaim">When you’re speaking with someone nearby, <strong>Conversation Awareness<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-5" aria-label="Footnote 3" data-modal-close>3</a></sup></strong> automatically lowers the volume of what’s playing and brings it right back up when you’re done.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="bento-container bento-borderless-top">
				<div class="bento">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-gestures">
						<div class="gestures-container" data-component-list="GesturesVideo">
							<div class="video-container" role="img" aria-label="An icon of a face nods up and down to say yes, and then shakes from right to left to say no.">
								<video class="gestures-video" muted playsinline preload="none" aria-hidden="true" data-inline-media-basepath="/105/media/us/airpods-pro/2024/b27a681d-da0c-42e3-8e0e-f37d5243ca69/anim/gesture/"></video>
							</div>
							<picture id="overview-gesture-startframe-1" class="overview-gesture-startframe gestures-startframe" data-lazy>

							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-gesture-startframe gestures-startframe">

					</picture>
				</noscript>
							<picture id="overview-gesture-endframe-1" class="overview-gesture-endframe gestures-endframe" data-lazy>
