							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-gesture-endframe gestures-endframe">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/gesture_endframe__bvrpfkwgsriq_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/gesture_endframe__bvrpfkwgsriq_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/gesture_endframe__bvrpfkwgsriq_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/gesture_endframe__bvrpfkwgsriq_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/gesture_endframe__bvrpfkwgsriq_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/gesture_endframe__bvrpfkwgsriq_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/gesture_endframe__bvrpfkwgsriq_large.png" alt="An icon of a face nods up and down to say yes, and then shakes from right to left to say no.">
					</picture>
				</noscript>
						</div>
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<span class="bento-eyebrow"></span>
							<p class="bento-headline">A new hands&#x2011;free<br />Siri experience.</p>
							<p class="copy">With <strong>Siri Interactions</strong>, you can simply nod your head yes or gently shake your head no when Siri asks if you’d like to answer an incoming call, hear a text message, or manage a notification.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-11" aria-label="Footnote 9" data-modal-close>9</a></sup> So it’s easier than ever to interact with Siri — even when you have your hands full or don’t want to speak out loud.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell-touch-control">
						<div class="touch-control-container">
							<div class="touch-control-airpod-pic-container">
								<picture id="overview-touch-control-airpod-1" class="overview-touch-control-airpod touch-control-airpod-pic" data-lazy>
									<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
									<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="The scooped area on the stem that activates Touch control.">
								</picture>
								<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-touch-control-airpod touch-control-airpod-pic">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/touch_control_airpod__e9hauo6fitim_large.jpg" alt="The scooped area on the stem that activates Touch control.">
					</picture>
				</noscript>
								<div class="touch-control-swipe-container" data-component-list="TouchControlSwipe">
									<div class="touch-control-swipe-dot"></div>
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="bento-headline">Just touch<br /> to adjust.</p>
							<p class="copy"><strong>Touch control</strong> lets you manage playback functions from the stem. Swipe up or down to adjust volume, press to play and pause music or mute and unmute yourself on calls, and press twice to end a call. You can also hold the stem to switch between listening modes.</p>
						</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</section>
		<section class="section section-personalized-listening theme-dark" data-anim-scroll-group="PersonalizedListening" data-component-list="PersonalizedListening" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:personalized listening">
			<div class="section-content personalized-listening-section-content">
				<h2 class="eyebrow-section">Personalized listening</h2>
				<h3 class="headline-section">Sound. <br />Tuned to you.</h3>
				<p class="intro-copy intro-copy-personalized-listening large-10 small-12">AirPods Pro 2 take the listening experience to a new level of individuality. Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-6" aria-label="Footnote 4" data-modal-close>4</a></sup> works with all your devices to immerse you deeper in all-around-you sound when you’re listening to music, watching a movie, or gaming. And Adaptive EQ accounts for the fit of AirPods Pro 2, so you hear every frequency just as it was intended.</p>
			</div>
			<div class="dancer-container dancer-scroll-container-small">
				<div class="dancer-sticky-content dancer-sticky-content-small">
					<div class="dancer-lockup-container">
						<div class="dancer-lockup">
							<picture id="overview-static-fallback-listening-1" class="overview-static-fallback-listening fallback-image" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "t - 200vh", "end": "b + 100vh", "disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="Visualized sound channels surrounding a dancer and playing audio from every direction.">
							</picture>
							<noscript>
										<picture class="overview-static-fallback-listening fallback-image">
											<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
											<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/static_fallback_listening__8e4bdah12r6u_large.jpg" alt="Visualized sound channels surrounding a dancer and playing audio from every direction.">
										</picture>
									</noscript>
							<div class="dancer-copy-container">
								<div class="section-content dancer-copy-section-content">
									<p data-focus-expression class="copy dancer-copy large-4 small-12">To play sound that better suits your unique ear shape, <span class="green-text">Personalized Spatial Audio</span> works with the TrueDepth camera on your iPhone to create a custom profile based on your head’s geometry. The profile syncs across your devices — delivering phenomenal sound every way you listen.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-6" aria-label="Footnote 4" data-modal-close>4</a></sup></p>
									<p data-focus-expression class="copy dancer-copy large-4 small-12"><span class='green-text'>Dynamic head tracking</span> brings three&#x2011;dimensional audio to gaming and Group FaceTime calls. Directional sound helps make conversations feel like you‘re in the same room with your friends and family.</p>
									<p data-focus-expression class="copy dancer-copy large-4 small-12"><strong class='green-text'>Adaptive EQ</strong> tunes music to your ears in real time based on the fit of AirPods Pro 2. Inward-facing microphones measure what you’re hearing, then adjust the low to high frequencies of a song — so you get consistently detailed playback, every time.</p>
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="dancer-video-container" data-component-list="VideoScroll">
						<video id="dancer-video" data-video-load-kf='{"start": "a0t - 200vh", "end": "a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".dancer-container", ".timeline-dancer-sequence"], "disabledWhen": ["no-enhanced", "android", "no-autoplay"]}' data-video-progress-kf='{"start": "css(--sequence-start, a0)",  "end": "css(--sequence-end, a0)", "anchors": [".dancer-container", ".timeline-dancer-sequence"], "disabledWhen": ["no-enhanced", "android", "no-autoplay"]}' data-video-basepath="/105/media/us/airpods-pro/2022/d2deeb8e-83eb-48ea-9721-f567cf0fffa8/anim/dancer/" playsinline muted aria-hidden="true"></video>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="timeline-dancer-sequence hide-on-static"></div>
			</div>
		</section>
		<section class="section section-case-battery theme-dark" data-anim-scroll-group="CaseBattery" data-component-list="CaseBattery" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:case battery">
			<div class="section-content case-battery__intro">
				<h2 class="eyebrow-section">Case and battery life</h2>
				<h3 class="headline-section">A case of unmistakable power.</h3>
				<p class="intro-copy large-10 small-12">The MagSafe Charging Case<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-12" aria-label="Footnote 10" data-modal-close>10</a></sup> is loaded with features that make listening on the move especially convenient. The case offers helpful ways to keep track of its location, and extended battery life lets you listen, watch, and talk longer between charges. You won’t find a more capable case.</p>
			</div>
			<div class="bento-container">
				<div class="bento">
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell--factoids">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="factoid factoid-anc"><span>Up to</span> <span class="stat"><span class="stat-number green-text">6</span><span class="stat-unit"> hours</span></span> of listening time with<br />pro-level Active Noise Cancellation enabled.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-13" aria-label="Footnote 11" data-modal-close>11</a></sup></p>
							<p class="factoid factoid-listening-time"><span>Up to</span> <span class='stat'><span class='stat-number green-text'>30</span><span class='stat-unit'> hours</span></span> of total listening time with<br />pro-level Active Noise Cancellation<br /> enabled, using the case.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-14" aria-label="Footnote 12" data-modal-close>12</a></sup></p>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="bento-cell bento-cell--magsafe">
						<div class="bento-cell-copy">
							<p class="copy">Recharge the <strong>MagSafe Charging Case</strong> with a <strong>USB&#x2011;C connector, Apple Watch charger, or MagSafe charger</strong>. You can also use a Qi&#x2011;certified charger.</p>
						</div>
						<picture id="overview-battery-magsafe-1" class="overview-battery-magsafe bento-cell__img bento-cell__img--magsafe" data-lazy>
							<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
							<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="3/4 angle of MagSafe Charging Case highlighting speaker, lanyard loop, and USB-C port, case hovers above Apple Watch charging puck.">
						</picture>
						<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-battery-magsafe bento-cell__img bento-cell__img--magsafe">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/battery_magsafe__b8uyauldcub6_large.jpg" alt="3/4 angle of MagSafe Charging Case highlighting speaker, lanyard loop, and USB-C port, case hovers above Apple Watch charging puck.">
					</picture>
				</noscript>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="section-content case-battery__scroll-container">
				<div class="case-battery__scroll-content" data-component-list="VideoScroll">
					<video id="case-battery-video" data-video-progress-kf='{"start": "a0t", "end": "a0t + (a0h - a1h) - 15vh", "anchors": [".case-battery__scroll-container", ".case-battery__scroll-content"], "disabledWhen": ["text-zoom", "no-heavy-media", "android", "no-autoplay"]}' data-video-load-kf='{"start": "a0t - 200vh", "end": "a0b + 200vh", "anchors": [".case-battery__scroll-container"], "disabledWhen": ["text-zoom", "no-heavy-media", "android", "no-autoplay"]}' data-video-basepath="/105/media/us/airpods-pro/2023/d95e50e8-29e3-41af-8760-1e058ebbe927/anim/case" playsinline muted aria-label="AirPods Pro floating out of an open MagSafe Charging Case."></video>
					<div class="scroll-copy-wrapper flex-column-center">
						<picture id="overview-case-front-1" class="overview-case-front case-battery__static-image fallback-image find-my" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "t - 200vh", "end": "b + 100vh", "disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>

						</picture>
						<noscript>
									<picture class="overview-case-front case-battery__static-image fallback-image find-my">
										<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_front__r6ng7f1x18a6_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_front__r6ng7f1x18a6_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_front__r6ng7f1x18a6_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_front__r6ng7f1x18a6_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_front__r6ng7f1x18a6_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_front__r6ng7f1x18a6_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />

									</picture>
								</noscript>
						<p data-focus-expression class="copy copy--scroll find-my">
							The <span class='green-text'>U1 chip</span> enables <strong>Find My with Precision Finding<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-15" aria-label="Footnote 13" data-modal-close>13</a></sup></strong> for your case, so you can locate it exactly. You can also use Find My if you lose track of your AirPods Pro 2.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-16" aria-label="Footnote 14" data-modal-close>14</a></sup>
						</p>
					</div>
					<div class="scroll-copy-wrapper flex-column-center">
						<picture id="overview-case-closed-1" class="overview-case-closed case-battery__static-image fallback-image lanyard" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "t - 200vh", "end": "b + 100vh", "disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>

						</picture>
						<noscript>
									<picture class="overview-case-side case-battery__static-image fallback-image lanyard">
										<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_side__bzfra9cv8342_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_side__bzfra9cv8342_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_side__bzfra9cv8342_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_side__bzfra9cv8342_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_side__bzfra9cv8342_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_side__bzfra9cv8342_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />

									</picture>
								</noscript>
						<span class="pin-overflow-container lanyard">
												<span class="pin pin-vertical pin-vertical-top lanyard"></span>
						</span>
						<p data-focus-expression class="copy copy--scroll lanyard">
							A <strong>lanyard loop</strong> allows you to attach the case to a backpack or handbag, so immersive sound is always within reach.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-17" aria-label="Footnote 15" data-modal-close>15</a></sup>
						</p>
					</div>
					<div class="scroll-copy-wrapper flex-column-center">
						<picture id="overview-case-bottom-1" class="overview-case-bottom case-battery__static-image fallback-image speaker-case" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "t - 200vh", "end": "b + 100vh", "disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>
							<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />

						</picture>
						<noscript>
									<picture class="overview-case-bottom case-battery__static-image fallback-image speaker-case">
										<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_bottom__ftg24ec32pu2_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_bottom__ftg24ec32pu2_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_bottom__ftg24ec32pu2_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_bottom__ftg24ec32pu2_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_bottom__ftg24ec32pu2_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_bottom__ftg24ec32pu2_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
										<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_bottom__ftg24ec32pu2_large.png" alt="Bottom of MagSafe Charging Case with three speaker holes built-in.">
									</picture>
								</noscript>
						<span class="pin-overflow-container speaker-case">
												<span class="pin pin-vertical pin-vertical-top speaker-case"></span>
						</span>
						<p data-focus-expression class="copy copy--scroll speaker-case">
							The case’s <strong>built&#x2011;in speaker</strong> plays sound to help you easily locate it, and <span class='green-text'>alert tones</span> let you know when the battery is low or pairing is complete.
						</p>
					</div>
					<div class="scroll-copy-wrapper flex-column-center">
						<picture id="overview-case-closed-2" class="overview-case-closed case-battery__static-image fallback-image water-resistant" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "t - 200vh", "end": "b + 100vh", "disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>

						</picture>
						<noscript>
									<picture class="overview-case-closed case-battery__static-image fallback-image water-resistant">
										<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_closed__fn3wuwvygjau_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_closed__fn3wuwvygjau_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_closed__fn3wuwvygjau_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_closed__fn3wuwvygjau_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_closed__fn3wuwvygjau_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_closed__fn3wuwvygjau_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
										<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/case_closed__fn3wuwvygjau_large.png" alt="Charging Case indicates full charge with green light at center of the case front.">
									</picture>
								</noscript>
						<p data-focus-expression class="copy copy--scroll water-resistant">
							Both AirPods Pro 2 and the MagSafe Charging Case are <strong>IP54 dust, sweat, and water resistant</strong>.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-18" aria-label="Footnote 16" data-modal-close>16</a></sup>
						</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</section>
		<section class="section section-magical-experience theme-dark" data-anim-scroll-group="MagicalExperience" data-component-list="MagicalExperience" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:magical experience">
			<div class="section-content magical-intro">
				<h2 class="eyebrow-section">Magical experience</h2>
				<h3 class="headline-section">Simplicity on a grand scale.</h3>
				<p class="intro-copy large-10 small-12">From instant setup to Siri commands, AirPods Pro 2 hold all the qualities that make the AirPods family so magical. And thoughtful features give you the ability to move through more tasks with unprecedented ease.</p>
			</div>
			<div class="magical-scroll-container section-content">
				<div class="magical-scroll-content section-content flex-column-center">
					<div class="magical-lockup-wrap flex-column-center">
						<div class="magical-hardware-wrap magical-hardware-wrap--static magical-hardware-wrap--enhanced flex-column-center">
							<video class="magical-video magical-screen" muted playsinline preload="none" aria-hidden="true" data-video-basepath="/105/media/us/airpods-pro/2022/d2deeb8e-83eb-48ea-9721-f567cf0fffa8/anim/pairing/" title="iPhone screen with AirPods Pro pairing animation" data-focus-expression></video>
							<picture id="overview-magical-screen-setup-1" class="overview-magical-screen-setup magical-screen magical-screen--setup video-fallback-image" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "a0t - 200vh", "end": "a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".magical-scroll-container"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_setup__et1gg0g0v8eq_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="MagSafe Charging Case holding AirPods Pro next to iPhone. Small tile on iPhone home screen displays pop-up with connect button that easily pairs AirPods when tapped.">
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-magical-screen-setup magical-screen magical-screen--setup video-fallback-image">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_setup__et1gg0g0v8eq_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_setup__et1gg0g0v8eq_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_setup__et1gg0g0v8eq_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_setup__et1gg0g0v8eq_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_setup__et1gg0g0v8eq_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_setup__et1gg0g0v8eq_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />

					</picture>
				</noscript>
							<picture id="overview-magical-iphone-hardware-1" class="overview-magical-iphone-hardware magical-hardware" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "a0t - 200vh", "end": "a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".magical-scroll-container"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-magical-iphone-hardware magical-hardware">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large.jpg" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
							<picture id="overview-magical-case-1" class="overview-magical-case magical-case go-on-state" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "a0t - 200vh", "end": "a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".magical-scroll-container"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large.png" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-magical-case magical-case go-on-state">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large.png" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
						</div>
						<div class="copy copy--scroll setup frontmost">
							<p data-focus-expression><strong>Easy, magical setup</strong> Place AirPods Pro 2 near your iPhone and tap Connect to seamlessly pair with every device in your Apple Account.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-19" aria-label="Footnote 17" data-modal-close>17</a></sup> And if your case is custom engraved, the same engraving appears on your device’s screen — for an even more personal experience.</p>
							<div class="replay-button-wrapper">
								<button class="typography-replay replay-button underline-fix" aria-hidden="true" aria-label="replay setup animation" disabled data-replay-for="setup-video" data-analytics-click="prop3:replay setup video" data-analytics-title="replay-setup-video" data-analytics-intrapage-link data-inline-media-control="PlayPause">
													<span class="icon-copy">Replay</span> <span class="icon icon-replay"></span>
												</button>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="magical-lockup-wrap flex-column-center">
						<div class="magical-hardware-wrap magical-hardware-wrap--static flex-column-center">
							<picture id="overview-magical-screen-audio-1" class="overview-magical-screen-audio magical-screen magical-screen--audio" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "a0t - 200vh", "end": "a0b + 100vh", "anchors": [".magical-scroll-container"]}' data-focus-expression='{"expression": "a0b - 100vh", "anchors": [".magical-scroll-container"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_audio__dzbihn6hl7au_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt="AirPods Pro in charging case next to iPhone, iPhone is connected to two sets of AirPods, each with individual volume control.">
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-magical-screen-audio magical-screen magical-screen--audio">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_audio__dzbihn6hl7au_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_audio__dzbihn6hl7au_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_audio__dzbihn6hl7au_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_audio__dzbihn6hl7au_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_audio__dzbihn6hl7au_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_screen_audio__dzbihn6hl7au_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />

					</picture>
				</noscript>
							<picture id="overview-magical-iphone-hardware-2" class="overview-magical-iphone-hardware magical-hardware fallback-image" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "t - 200vh", "end": "b + 100vh", "disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large.jpg" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-magical-iphone-hardware magical-hardware fallback-image">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_small.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_small_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_medium.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_medium_2x.jpg 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large.jpg, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large_2x.jpg 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_iphone_hardware__ff15ryl53xay_large.jpg" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
							<picture id="overview-magical-case-2" class="overview-magical-case magical-case fallback-image" data-lazy data-download-area-keyframe='{"start": "t - 200vh", "end": "b + 100vh", "disabledWhen": ["enhanced"]}'>
								<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
								<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large.png" onload="__lp(event)" alt="AirPods Pro in charging case next to iPhone, iPhone is connected to two sets of AirPods, each with individual volume control.">
							</picture>
							<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-magical-case magical-case fallback-image">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/magical_case__epo6duhktocy_large.png" alt="AirPods Pro in charging case next to iPhone, iPhone is connected to two sets of AirPods, each with individual volume control.">
					</picture>
				</noscript>
						</div>
						<p data-focus-expression class="copy copy--scroll audio-sharing"><strong>Audio Sharing</strong> Easily share a song or show between any two sets of AirPods. Simply bring AirPods near the iPhone, iPad, or Apple TV you’re listening to and connect instantly.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-20" aria-label="Footnote 18" data-modal-close>18</a></sup></p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="magical-stationary-copy-container section-content">
				<div class="magical-copy-icon-wrap">
					<picture id="overview-icon-siri-1" class="overview-icon-siri magical-icon" data-lazy>
						<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_large.png" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
					</picture>
					<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-icon-siri magical-icon">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_siri__dqxcsraxw8k2_large.png" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
					<p class="copy copy--stationary"><strong>Always-on Siri</strong> Play music, make calls, get directions, or check your schedule simply by using your voice. Just say “Siri”<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-21" aria-label="Footnote 19" data-modal-close>19</a></sup> or “Hey Siri” to activate your favorite personal assistant and stay on top of everyday tasks.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-22" aria-label="Footnote 20" data-modal-close>20</a></sup></p>
				</div>
				<div class="magical-copy-icon-wrap">
					<picture id="overview-icon-switching-1" class="overview-icon-switching magical-icon" data-lazy>
						<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_large.png" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
					</picture>
					<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-icon-switching magical-icon">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_switching__bz49537ud9le_large.png" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
					<p class="copy copy--stationary"><strong>Seamless switching</strong> Automatic Switching is fast and reliable between your iPhone, iPad, and Mac, and easily moves to your Apple Watch. So if you’re playing music on your Mac, you can answer a call on your iPhone — without having to switch devices.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-19" aria-label="Footnote 17" data-modal-close>17</a></sup></p>
				</div>
				<div class="magical-copy-icon-wrap">
					<picture id="overview-icon-accessibility-1" class="overview-icon-accessibility magical-icon" data-lazy>
						<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_large.png" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
					</picture>
					<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-icon-accessibility magical-icon">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_accessibility__bkbcpwu51vv6_large.png" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
					<p class="copy copy--stationary"><strong>AirPods and accessibility</strong> Features like Conversation Boost bring focus to voices directly in front of you. Headphone Accommodations amplify frequencies you may need to hear clearly. If you need to focus on a guest speaker in a bustling auditorium, Live Listen works with your iPhone to pick up sound at a distance. And for perceived mild to moderate hearing loss, you can use AirPods Pro 2 as a clinical&#x2011;grade Hearing Aid feature.</p>
				</div>
				<div class="magical-copy-icon-wrap">
					<picture id="overview-icon-notifications-1" class="overview-icon-notifications magical-icon" data-lazy>
						<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_large.png" onload="__lp(event)" alt>
					</picture>
					<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-icon-notifications magical-icon">
						<source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_small.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_small_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:734px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_medium.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_medium_2x.png 2x" media="(max-width:1068px)" /><source srcset="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_large.png, /v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_large_2x.png 2x" media="(min-width:0px)" />
						<img src="/v/airpods-pro/n/images/overview/icon_notifications__filjzonu8s6e_large.png" alt>
					</picture>
				</noscript>
					<p class="copy copy--stationary"><strong>Announce Notifications</strong> Siri can read your important messages or alerts as they arrive — and you can reply to messages with just your voice.<sup class="footnote footnote-number"><a href="#footnote-22" aria-label="Footnote 20" data-modal-close>20</a></sup></p>
				</div>
			</div>
		</section>
		<section class="section section-ar" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:ar">
			<div class="section-content">
				<div class="banner-copy">

					</picture>
				</noscript>
					<h2 class="typography-headline">Use AR to see<br />AirPods Pro 2.</h2>

		<section class="section section-engraving router router-engraving" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:engraving">
			<div class="section-content">
				<div class="banner-copy">
					<h2 class="typography-headline">Say it in a way only&nbsp;you&nbsp;can.</h2>
					<p class="typography-router-tagline">Discover the engraving options for AirPods. Mix emoji, text, and numbers.</p>
					<p class="typography-router-tagline">
						<a href="/us/shop/goto/buy_airpods/airpods_pro_2" data-analytics-title="buy airpods pro 2 - engraving" aria-label="Buy AirPods Pro 2 with personalized engraving" class="icon-wrapper"><span class="icon-copy">Buy AirPods Pro 2</span><span class="icon icon-after more"></span></a> </p>
				</div>
				<div class="image-wrapper">
					<picture id="overview-router-engraving-1" class="overview-router-engraving image-engraving" data-lazy>
						<source data-empty srcset="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAHAAACH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAICRAEAOw==" media="(min-width:0px)" />

					</picture>
					<noscript>
					<picture class="overview-router-engraving image-engraving">

		<section class="section section-apple-music router router-music" data-component-list="MusicRouter" data-album-id="1739842642" data-locale="us" data-lang="en-US" data-anim-scroll-group="MusicRouter" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:apple music">
			<div class="section-content row">
				<div class="column column-copy large-6 small-12">
					<svg class="apple-music-logo" viewBox="0 0 83 20" aria-label="Apple Music" role="text">
									<path d="M34.752 19.746V6.243h-.088l-5.433 13.503h-2.074L21.711 6.243h-.087v13.503h-2.548V1.399h3.235l5.833 14.621h.1L34.064 1.4h3.248v18.347h-2.56zm16.649 0h-2.586v-2.263h-.062c-.725 1.602-2.061 2.504-4.072 2.504-2.86 0-4.61-1.894-4.61-4.958V6.37h2.698v8.125c0 2.034.95 3.127 2.81 3.127 1.95 0 3.124-1.373 3.124-3.458V6.37H51.4v13.376zm7.394-13.618c3.06 0 5.046 1.73 5.134 4.196h-2.536c-.15-1.296-1.087-2.11-2.598-2.11-1.462 0-2.436.724-2.436 1.793 0 .839.6 1.41 2.023 1.741l2.136.496c2.686.636 3.71 1.704 3.71 3.636 0 2.442-2.236 4.12-5.333 4.12-3.285 0-5.26-1.64-5.509-4.183h2.673c.25 1.398 1.187 2.085 2.836 2.085 1.623 0 2.623-.687 2.623-1.78 0-.865-.487-1.373-1.924-1.704l-2.136-.508c-2.498-.585-3.735-1.806-3.735-3.75 0-2.391 2.049-4.032 5.072-4.032zM66.1 2.836c0-.878.7-1.577 1.561-1.577.862 0 1.55.7 1.55 1.577 0 .864-.688 1.576-1.55 1.576a1.573 1.573 0 0 1-1.56-1.576zm.212 3.534h2.698v13.376h-2.698V6.37zm14.089 4.603c-.275-1.424-1.324-2.556-3.085-2.556-2.086 0-3.46 1.767-3.46 4.64 0 2.938 1.386 4.642 3.485 4.642 1.66 0 2.748-.928 3.06-2.48H83C82.713 18.067 80.477 20 77.317 20c-3.76 0-6.208-2.62-6.208-6.942 0-4.247 2.448-6.93 6.183-6.93 3.385 0 5.446 2.213 5.683 4.845h-2.573zM10.824 3.189c-.698.834-1.805 1.496-2.913 1.398-.145-1.128.41-2.33 1.036-3.065C9.644.662 10.848.05 11.835 0c.121 1.178-.336 2.33-1.01 3.19zm.999 1.619c.624.049 2.425.244 3.578 1.98-.096.074-2.137 1.272-2.113 3.79.024 3.01 2.593 4.012 2.617 4.037-.024.074-.407 1.419-1.344 2.812-.817 1.224-1.657 2.422-3.002 2.447-1.297.024-1.73-.783-3.218-.783-1.489 0-1.97.758-3.194.807-1.297.048-2.28-1.297-3.097-2.52C.368 14.908-.904 10.408.825 7.375c.84-1.516 2.377-2.47 4.034-2.495 1.273-.023 2.45.857 3.218.857.769 0 2.137-1.027 3.746-.93z"></path>

				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-pro-2 siri row">
				<div class="feature-wrapper">
					<figure class="image-siri image-compare-icon" data-anim-lazy-image></figure>
					<span class="typography-compare-copy column"><p><span class="nowrap">Voice Isolation, <sup class="footnote footnote-airpods footnote-airpods-2nd-gen footnote-airpods-2nd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-3rd-gen footnote-airpods-3rd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-pro-2 footnote-airpods-pro-specs footnote-airpods-max footnote-airpods-max-specs"><a href="#footnote-compare-voice-isolation" aria-label="Footnote ΔΔΔ symbol">ΔΔΔ</a></sup></span> Hey Siri,<br />and <span class="nowrap">Siri Interactions <sup class="footnote footnote-airpods footnote-airpods-2nd-gen footnote-airpods-2nd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-3rd-gen footnote-airpods-3rd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-pro-2 footnote-airpods-pro-specs footnote-airpods-max footnote-airpods-max-specs"><a href="#footnote-compare-voice-isolation" aria-label="Footnote ΔΔΔ symbol">ΔΔΔ</a></sup></span></p>
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-pro-2 charging row">
				<div class="feature-wrapper">
					<figure class="image-charging image-compare-icon" data-anim-lazy-image></figure>
					<span class="typography-compare-copy column"><p>Wireless Charging Case (USB&#x2011;C) with <span class="nowrap">MagSafe, <sup class="footnote footnote-airpods footnote-airpods-2nd-gen footnote-airpods-2nd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-3rd-gen footnote-airpods-3rd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-pro-2 footnote-airpods-pro-specs footnote-airpods-max footnote-airpods-max-specs"><a href="#footnote-compare-magsafe" aria-label="Footnote ΔΔΔΔ symbol">ΔΔΔΔ</a></sup></span> speaker for Find My with <span class="nowrap">Precision Finding, <sup class="footnote footnote-airpods footnote-airpods-2nd-gen footnote-airpods-2nd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-3rd-gen footnote-airpods-3rd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-pro-2 footnote-airpods-pro-specs footnote-airpods-max footnote-airpods-max-specs"><a href="#footnote-compare-precision" aria-label="Footnote ΔΔΔΔΔ symbol">ΔΔΔΔΔ</a></sup></span> and lanyard loop</p>
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-max device ">
				<div class="image-wrap">
					<a href="/airpods-max/" data-analytics-title="learn more - airpods max" aria-label="Learn more about AirPods Max">
						<figure class="image-airpods-max" data-anim-lazy-image alt="AirPods Max"></figure>
					</a>
				</div>
				<div class="device-content">
					<span class="violator typography-caption new-violator">New colors</span>
					<h3 class="typography-compare-device-headline">AirPods Max
					</h3>
					<p class="typography-compare-copy subhead">The ultimate over&#x2011;ear listening experience.</p>
					<p class="typography-compare-price pricing" data-pricing-product="airpods-max" data-product-template="${price.display.smart}"></p>
					<ul class="links-stacked">
						<li>
							<a href="/us/shop/goto/buy_airpods/airpods_max" data-analytics-title="buy - airpods max" aria-label="Buy AirPods Max." class="button button-reduced">Buy</a>
						</li>
						<li>
							<a href="/airpods-max/" data-analytics-title="learn more - airpods max" aria-label="Learn more about AirPods Max" class="icon-wrapper typography-compare-copy learn-more"><span class="icon-copy">Learn more</span><span class="icon icon-after more"></span></a> </li>
						<li class="compare-quicklook-component typography-compare-copy">
							<a rel="ar" href="/105/media/us/airpods-max/2024/e8f376d6-82b2-40ca-8a22-5f87de755d6b/ar/airpods-max-midnight.usdz" class="icon icon-after icon-arkit" data-analytics-title="see airpods max in ar" data-analytics-click="prop3:see airpods max in ar" aria-label="View AirPods Max in augmented reality" data-analytics-intrapage-link>
												<img src="/v/airpods/shared/compare/e/images/compare/quicklook_placeholder__blj911n6rvg2_large.jpg"><span>View in AR</span>
											</a>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-max anc-transparency row">
				<div class="feature-wrapper">
					<figure class="image-anc-transparency image-compare-icon" data-anim-lazy-image></figure>
					<span class="typography-compare-copy column"><p>Up to 2x more Active Noise <span class="nowrap">Cancellation, <sup class="footnote footnote-airpods footnote-airpods-2nd-gen footnote-airpods-2nd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-3rd-gen footnote-airpods-3rd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-pro-2 footnote-airpods-pro-specs footnote-airpods-max footnote-airpods-max-specs"><a href="#footnote-compare-noise-cancellation" aria-label="Footnote ◊◊ symbol">◊◊</a></sup></span> with Transparency mode</p>
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-max spatial-audio row">
				<div class="feature-wrapper">
					<figure class="image-spatial-audio image-compare-icon" data-anim-lazy-image></figure>
					<span class="typography-compare-copy column"><p>Personalized Spatial Audio <br class="large" />with dynamic <span class="nowrap">head tracking <sup class="footnote footnote-airpods footnote-airpods-2nd-gen footnote-airpods-2nd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-3rd-gen footnote-airpods-3rd-gen-specs footnote-airpods-pro-2 footnote-airpods-pro-specs footnote-airpods-max footnote-airpods-max-specs"><a href="#footnote-compare-spatial-audio" aria-label="Footnote ◊◊◊ symbol">◊◊◊</a></sup></span></p>
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-max hearing-aid row">
				<span><p aria-hidden="true" class="mdash">—</p><p class="visuallyhidden">Hearing Test, Hearing Aid feature, and Hearing Protection unavailable</p></span>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-max siri row">
				<div class="feature-wrapper">
					<figure class="image-siri image-compare-icon" data-anim-lazy-image></figure>
					<span class="typography-compare-copy column"><p>Hey Siri</p>
</span>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="airpods-max charging row">
				<div class="feature-wrapper">
					<figure class="image-charging image-compare-icon" data-anim-lazy-image></figure>
					<span class="typography-compare-copy column"><p>Smart Case</p>

				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<p class="typography-compare-section-cta compare-module-cta">

	</div>

			<h2 class="ac-gf-label" id="ac-gf-label">Apple Footer</h2>
			<section class="ac-gf-buystrip" data-analytics-section-engagement="name:buy strip">
				<div class="ac-gf-buystrip-info with-4-columns">
					
					
									
						
		<section class="ac-gf-buystrip-info-column ac-gf-buystrip-info-shipping" data-analytics-region="shipping">

			</section>
			<section class="ac-gf-sosumi" data-nosnippet aria-label="Footnotes">
				

















				<ul>
					<li id="footnote-1"><small>*</small> New subscribers only.
						$10.99/month after trial. Offer is available for new Apple&nbsp;Music subscribers with a new eligible device for a limited time only. Offer redemption for eligible audio devices requires connecting or pairing to an Apple device running the latest iOS or iPadOS. Offer redemption for Apple&nbsp;Watch requires connecting or pairing to an iPhone running the latest iOS. Offer good for three months after eligible device activation. Only one offer per Apple&nbsp;Account, regardless of the number of eligible devices you purchase. Plan automatically renews until cancelled. Restrictions and other <a href="/promo/">terms</a>&nbsp;apply.</li>
				</ul>
				<ol>
					<li id="footnote-3">The Hearing&nbsp;Aid feature has received FDA authorization. The Hearing&nbsp;Test and Hearing&nbsp;Aid features are supported on AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 with the latest firmware paired with a compatible iPhone or iPad with iOS&nbsp;18 or iPadOS&nbsp;18 and later and are intended for people 18 years old or older. The Hearing&nbsp;Aid feature is also supported on a compatible Mac with macOS&nbsp;Sequoia and later. It is intended for people with perceived mild to moderate hearing loss. Hearing&nbsp;Health features are subject to change. Some features may not be available in all regions or all&nbsp;languages. <a href="/airpods-pro/feature-availability/" data-analytics-title="view complete list" aria-label="View a list of Hearing Health features available by region">View&nbsp;complete&nbsp;list</a>.</li>
					<li id="footnote-4">Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation compared with AirPods&nbsp;Pro (1st generation) and AirPods&nbsp;4 with Active Noise Cancellation.</li>
					<li id="footnote-5">Available on compatible devices running iOS&nbsp;18, iPadOS&nbsp;18, or macOS&nbsp;Sequoia and later when paired with AirPods&nbsp;4 with Active&nbsp;Noise&nbsp;Cancellation or AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 with the latest firmware.</li>
					<li id="footnote-6">Compatible hardware and software required. Works with compatible content in supported apps. Not all content available in Dolby Atmos. iPhone with TrueDepth camera required to create a personal profile for Spatial Audio, which will sync across Apple devices running the latest operating system software, including iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and tvOS.</li>
					<li id="footnote-7">The Hearing&nbsp;Protection feature works with AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 with the latest firmware when paired with a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac with iOS&nbsp;18, iPadOS&nbsp;18, or macOS&nbsp;Sequoia and later. Feature is only available in the U.S. and Canada. See <a href="https://support.apple.com/120850">support.apple.com/120850</a> for total attenuation and more information. The Hearing&nbsp;Protection feature is not suitable for protection against extremely loud impulse sounds, such as gunfire, fireworks, or jackhammers, or against sustained sounds louder than 110&nbsp;dBA.</li>
					<li id="footnote-8">Available with Apple Vision Pro (based on country availability) when paired with AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 with MagSafe Charging Case (USB&#x2011;C) with the latest firmware.</li>
					<li id="footnote-9">Device performance and noise control features like Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Audio, and Transparency can be affected by debris or earwax buildup. Clean the device regularly to maintain performance and full feature functionality. Refer to <a href="https://support.apple.com/102672">support.apple.com/102672</a> for AirPods 4 cleaning instructions. Refer to <a href="https://support.apple.com/120409">support.apple.com/120409</a> for AirPods&nbsp;Pro 2 cleaning instructions.</li>
					<li id="footnote-10">Hearing Health features are subject to change. Some features may not be available in all regions or all languages. <a href="/airpods-pro/feature-availability/" data-analytics-title="view complete list" aria-label="View a list of Hearing Health features available by region">View&nbsp;complete&nbsp;list</a>.</li>
					<li id="footnote-11">Available on compatible devices running iOS 18, iPadOS 18, or macOS Sequoia and later when paired with AirPods Pro 2 with the latest firmware.</li>
					<li id="footnote-12">USB&#x2011;C charging requires a compatible USB&#x2011;C charger. Wireless charging requires a Qi&#x2011;certified wireless charger. MagSafe charging requires a compatible MagSafe charger. AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation and AirPods Pro 2 charging cases also work with the Apple Watch charger.</li>
					<li id="footnote-13">Testing conducted by Apple in August 2023 using preproduction AirPods Pro 2 with MagSafe Charging Case (USB&#x2011;C) and software paired with preproduction iPhone 15 Pro units and software. The playlist consisted of 358 unique audio tracks purchased from the iTunes Store (256&#x2011;Kbps AAC encoding). Volume was set to 50% and Active Noise Cancellation was enabled. With Spatial Audio and Head Tracking enabled, listening time was up to 5.5 hours. Testing consisted of full AirPods Pro battery discharge while playing audio until the first AirPod Pro stopped playback. Battery life depends on device settings, environment, usage, and many other factors.</li>
					<li id="footnote-14">Testing conducted by Apple in August 2023 using preproduction AirPods Pro 2 with MagSafe Charging Case (USB&#x2011;C) and software paired with preproduction iPhone 15 Pro units and software. The playlist consisted of 358 unique audio tracks purchased from the iTunes Store (256&#x2011;Kbps AAC encoding). Volume was set to 50% and Active Noise Cancellation was enabled. Testing consisted of full AirPods Pro battery discharge while playing audio until the first AirPod Pro stopped playback. The drained AirPods Pro were charged to 100 percent, then audio playback was resumed until the first AirPod Pro stopped playback. This cycle was repeated until both the AirPods Pro and charging case were fully discharged. Battery life depends on device settings, environment, usage, and many other factors.</li>
					<li id="footnote-15">Precision Finding requires a U1-equipped iPhone; availability varies by region.</li>
					<li id="footnote-16">Find My functionality requires iOS 18 or later.</li>
					<li id="footnote-17">Lanyard sold&nbsp;separately.</li>
					<li id="footnote-18">AirPods&nbsp;4, AirPods&nbsp;4 with Active Noise Cancellation, and AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 are dust, sweat, and water resistant for non-water sports and exercise. Products and charging case were tested under controlled laboratory conditions, and have a rating of IP54 under IEC standard 60529. Dust, sweat, and water resistance are not permanent conditions and resistance might decrease as a result of normal wear. Do not attempt to charge when wet; refer to <a href="https://support.apple.com/kb/HT210711">support.apple.com/kb/HT210711</a> for cleaning and drying instructions.</li>
					<li id="footnote-19">Requires an Apple Account and a compatible Apple device running the latest operating system software.</li>
					<li id="footnote-20">Requires a compatible Apple device running the latest operating system software.</li>
					<li id="footnote-21">Siri and activating with just “Siri” may not be available in all languages or in all areas, and features may vary by area. Compatible device and internet access required. Cellular data charges may apply. Activating with just “Siri” is not available on AirPods with the H1 headphone chip and Intel&#x2011;based Mac computers. Devices must support and have the latest operating system software.</li>
					<li id="footnote-22">Siri may not be available in all languages or in all areas, and features may vary by area. Compatible device and internet access required. Cellular data charges may apply.</li>
				</ol>
				<ul>
					<li id="footnote-2" data-toggle-footnote="acmi"><small>†</small>
						Apple Card Monthly Installments (ACMI) is a 0% APR payment option that is only available if you select it at checkout in the U.S. for eligible products purchased at Apple Store locations, <a href="/">apple.com</a>, the Apple Store app, or by calling 1&#8209;800&#8209;MY&#8209;APPLE, and is subject to credit approval and credit limit. See <a href="https://support.apple.com/102730">support.apple.com/102730</a> for more information about eligible products. Existing customers: See your Customer Agreement for your variable APR. As of December 1, 2024, the variable APR on new Apple Card accounts ranges from 18.49% to 28.74%. You must elect to use ACMI at checkout. If you buy an ACMI&#8209;eligible product with a one-time payment on Apple Card at checkout, that purchase is subject to your Apple Card’s variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. Taxes and shipping on items purchased using ACMI are subject to your Apple Card’s variable APR, not the ACMI 0% APR. In order to buy an iPhone with ACMI, you must select one of the following carriers: AT&T, Boost Mobile, T&#8209;Mobile, or Verizon. An iPhone purchased with ACMI is always unlocked, so you can switch carriers at any time, subject to your carrier’s terms. ACMI is not available for purchases made online at the following special stores: Apple Employee Purchase Plan; participating corporate Employee Purchase Programs; Apple at Work for small businesses; Government and Veterans and Military Purchase Programs; or on refurbished devices. The last month’s payment for each product will be the product’s purchase price, less all other payments at the monthly payment amount. ACMI is subject to change at any time for any reason, including but not limited to installment term lengths and eligible products. See the <a href="https://www.goldmansachs.com/terms-and-conditions/Apple-Card-Customer-Agreement.pdf" rel="nofollow">Apple Card Customer Agreement</a> for more information about ACMI.
					</li>
				</ul>
				<ul>
					<li><span id="footnote-compare-adaptive-audio">◊ Adaptive Audio is available on compatible devices running iOS 18, iPadOS 18, or macOS Sequoia and later when paired with AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation or AirPods Pro 2 with the latest firmware. Device performance and noise control features like Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Audio, and Transparency can be affected by debris or earwax buildup. Clean the device regularly to maintain performance and full feature functionality. Refer to <a href="https://support.apple.com/102672">support.apple.com/102672</a> for AirPods 4 cleaning instructions. Refer to <a href="https://support.apple.com/120409">support.apple.com/120409</a> for AirPods Pro 2 cleaning instructions.</span></li>
					<li><span id="footnote-compare-noise-cancellation">◊◊ Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation compared with AirPods Pro (1st generation) and AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation.</span></li>
					<li><span id='footnote-compare-spatial-audio'>◊◊◊ Compatible hardware and software required. Works with compatible content in supported apps. Not all content available in Dolby Atmos. iPhone with TrueDepth camera required to create a personal profile for Spatial Audio, which will sync across Apple devices running the latest operating system software, including iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and tvOS.</span></li>
					<li><span id='footnote-compare-hearing'>Δ The Hearing&nbsp;Aid feature has received FDA authorization. The Hearing&nbsp;Test and Hearing&nbsp;Aid features are supported on AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 with the latest firmware paired with a compatible iPhone or iPad with iOS&nbsp;18 or iPadOS&nbsp;18 and later and are intended for people 18 years old or older. The Hearing&nbsp;Aid feature is also supported on a compatible Mac with macOS&nbsp;Sequoia and later. It is intended for people with perceived mild to moderate hearing&nbsp;loss.</span></li>
					<li><span id="footnote-compare-hearing-protection">ΔΔ The Hearing Protection feature works with AirPods Pro 2 with the latest firmware when paired with a compatible iPhone, iPad, or Mac with iOS 18, iPadOS 18, or macOS Sequoia and later. Feature is only available in the U.S. and Canada. See <a href="https://support.apple.com/120850">support.apple.com/120850</a> for total attenuation and more information. The Hearing Protection feature is not suitable for protection against extremely loud impulse sounds, such as gunfire, fireworks, or jackhammers, or against sustained sounds louder than 110 dBA.</span></li>
					<li><span id="footnote-compare-voice-isolation">ΔΔΔ Available on compatible devices running iOS&nbsp;18, iPadOS&nbsp;18, or macOS&nbsp;Sequoia and later when paired with AirPods&nbsp;4, AirPods&nbsp;4 with Active Noise Cancellation, or AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 with the latest firmware.</span></li>
					<li><span id='footnote-compare-magsafe'>ΔΔΔΔ USB&#x2011;C charging requires a compatible USB&#x2011;C charger. Wireless charging requires a Qi&#x2011;certified wireless charger. MagSafe charging requires a compatible MagSafe charger. AirPods&nbsp;4 with Active&nbsp;Noise&nbsp;Cancellation and AirPods&nbsp;Pro&nbsp;2 charging cases also work with the Apple&nbsp;Watch&nbsp;charger.</span></li>
					<li><span id="footnote-compare-precision">ΔΔΔΔΔ Precision Finding requires a U1&#x2011;equipped iPhone; availability varies by&nbsp;region.</span></li>
					<li data-toggle-footnote="acmi">
						<p>To access and use all Apple Card features and products available only to Apple Card users, you must add Apple Card to Wallet on an iPhone or iPad that supports and has the latest version of iOS or iPadOS. Apple Card is subject to credit approval, available only for qualifying applicants in the United States, and issued by Goldman Sachs Bank USA, Salt Lake City Branch.</p>
<p style="padding-top: 0.8em;">If you reside in the U.S. territories, please call Goldman Sachs at 877-255-5923 with questions about Apple Card.</p>
					</li>
				</ul>
			</section>

			"description": "AirPods Pro 2 — Pro-level Active Noise Cancellation, Adaptive Audio, Transparency, Personalized Spatial Audio, and a total hearing health experience.",
			"url": "https://www.apple.com/airpods-pro/",
			"mainEntityOfPage": "https://www.apple.com/airpods-pro/",
			"image": "https://www.apple.com/v/airpods-pro/n/images/meta/og__eui2mpgzwyaa_overview.png",
			"potentialAction": {
				"@type": "BuyAction",
				"seller": {
					"@id": "https://www.apple.com/#organization"
				},
				"url": ["https://www.apple.com/us/shop/goto/buy_airpods/airpods_pro_2"]
			}
		}
	</script>
	<script src="/v/airpods-pro/n/built/scripts/main.built.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
	

<script src="/metrics/data-relay/1.1.4/scripts/data-relay.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
<script src="/metrics/data-relay/1.1.4/scripts/auto-relay.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="/ac/ac-films/7.0.0/styles/modal.css" />
<script src="/ac/ac-films/7.0.0/scripts/autofilms.built.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
</body>
</html>
          Parameter 
          campaign
          Solution

          Validate all input and sanitize output it before writing to any HTML attributes.

Appendix

Alert types

This section contains additional information on the types of alerts in the report.

  1. CSP: Wildcard Directive

    Source raised by a passive scanner (CSP)
    CWE ID 693
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/
    2. https://caniuse.com/#search=content+security+policy
    3. https://content-security-policy.com/
    4. https://github.com/HtmlUnit/htmlunit-csp
    5. https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/security/csp#policy_applies_to_a_wide_variety_of_resources

  2. CSP: script-src unsafe-eval

    Source raised by a passive scanner (CSP)
    CWE ID 693
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/
    2. https://caniuse.com/#search=content+security+policy
    3. https://content-security-policy.com/
    4. https://github.com/HtmlUnit/htmlunit-csp
    5. https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/security/csp#policy_applies_to_a_wide_variety_of_resources

  3. CSP: script-src unsafe-inline

    Source raised by a passive scanner (CSP)
    CWE ID 693
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/
    2. https://caniuse.com/#search=content+security+policy
    3. https://content-security-policy.com/
    4. https://github.com/HtmlUnit/htmlunit-csp
    5. https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/security/csp#policy_applies_to_a_wide_variety_of_resources

  4. CSP: style-src unsafe-inline

    Source raised by a passive scanner (CSP)
    CWE ID 693
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/
    2. https://caniuse.com/#search=content+security+policy
    3. https://content-security-policy.com/
    4. https://github.com/HtmlUnit/htmlunit-csp
    5. https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/security/csp#policy_applies_to_a_wide_variety_of_resources

  5. Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set)
    CWE ID 693
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Security/CSP/Introducing_Content_Security_Policy
    2. https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/Content_Security_Policy_Cheat_Sheet.html
    3. https://www.w3.org/TR/CSP/
    4. https://w3c.github.io/webappsec-csp/
    5. https://web.dev/articles/csp
    6. https://caniuse.com/#feat=contentsecuritypolicy
    7. https://content-security-policy.com/

  6. Cross-Domain Misconfiguration

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Cross-Domain Misconfiguration)
    CWE ID 264
    WASC ID 14
    Reference
    1. https://vulncat.fortify.com/en/detail?id=desc.config.dotnet.html5_overly_permissive_cors_policy

  7. Cookie No HttpOnly Flag

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Cookie No HttpOnly Flag)
    CWE ID 1004
    WASC ID 13
    Reference
    1. https://owasp.org/www-community/HttpOnly

  8. Cookie Without Secure Flag

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Cookie Without Secure Flag)
    CWE ID 614
    WASC ID 13
    Reference
    1. https://owasp.org/www-project-web-security-testing-guide/v41/4-Web_Application_Security_Testing/06-Session_Management_Testing/02-Testing_for_Cookies_Attributes.html

  9. Cookie without SameSite Attribute

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Cookie without SameSite Attribute)
    CWE ID 1275
    WASC ID 13
    Reference
    1. https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-httpbis-cookie-same-site

  10. Cross-Domain JavaScript Source File Inclusion

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Cross-Domain JavaScript Source File Inclusion)
    CWE ID 829
    WASC ID 15

  11. Timestamp Disclosure - Unix

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Timestamp Disclosure)
    CWE ID 200
    WASC ID 13
    Reference
    1. https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/200.html

  12. Information Disclosure - Suspicious Comments

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Information Disclosure - Suspicious Comments)
    CWE ID 200
    WASC ID 13

  13. Loosely Scoped Cookie

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Loosely Scoped Cookie)
    CWE ID 565
    WASC ID 15
    Reference
    1. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6265#section-4.1
    2. https://owasp.org/www-project-web-security-testing-guide/v41/4-Web_Application_Security_Testing/06-Session_Management_Testing/02-Testing_for_Cookies_Attributes.html
    3. https://code.google.com/p/browsersec/wiki/Part2#Same-origin_policy_for_cookies

  14. Modern Web Application

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Modern Web Application)

  15. Re-examine Cache-control Directives

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Re-examine Cache-control Directives)
    CWE ID 525
    WASC ID 13
    Reference
    1. https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/Session_Management_Cheat_Sheet.html#web-content-caching
    2. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Cache-Control
    3. https://grayduck.mn/2021/09/13/cache-control-recommendations/

  16. Session Management Response Identified

    Source raised by a passive scanner (Session Management Response Identified)
    Reference
    1. https://www.zaproxy.org/docs/desktop/addons/authentication-helper/session-mgmt-id

  17. User Controllable HTML Element Attribute (Potential XSS)

    Source raised by a passive scanner (User Controllable HTML Element Attribute (Potential XSS))
    CWE ID 20
    WASC ID 20
    Reference
    1. https://cheatsheetseries.owasp.org/cheatsheets/Input_Validation_Cheat_Sheet.html
